description: The Sour family of&nbsp;drinks has been around for centuries, and the New York Sour is a popular cocktail that has its origins in Prohibition-era America. Today's recipe will have you creating a delicious Sour with rye whiskey, lemon juice, egg white, sugar syrup, and red wine.
name: New York Sour

recipeInstructions.name: Mix all ingredients in a shaker or blender. Fill with ice cubes and shake for about 15 seconds.
recipeInstructions.text: Mix all ingredients in a shaker or blender. Fill with ice cubes and shake for about 15 seconds.

recipeInstructions.name: Strain into glass, garnish with half an orange wheel, and enjoy!
